## Pre-PR checklist

- [ ] Ran `npm run serve` and:
  - [ ] Checked basic functionality
  - [ ] Checked that errors are handled
- [ ] Ran `npm run lint`
- [ ] Ran `npm run test:unit`
- [ ] Ran `npm run test:e2e` and ran relevant tests
